Many people around us are getting sick, and
one of the most common health issues is altered
blood pressure.

You certainly know someone who has high blood
pressure, don't you?
Even you can have this issue.

In a recent video, we mentioned some uncommon
causes for high blood pressure, did you watch
it?

Here on the channel, we also taught you an
exercise to check if your blood pressure is
high without any equipment.
Did you watch it?
Click here to learn how to do it.

Blood pressure is nothing more than the pumping
system that transports blood through the heart

and arteries and brings blood flow to the
brain and other organs.

The normal blood pressure level is 120/80
mmHg.

If the numbers differ from this, you have
either hypertension (high BP), with a level

above 140/90, or hypotension (low BP), under
90/60.

A way of differentiating between high and
low blood pressure is their symptoms.

In high blood pressure, you usually get double
or blurry vision, ringing in the ears, and

even some heart palpitations, persistent headaches,
and pain in the back of the head.

However, you don't need to be hypertensive
to have altered blood pressure.

This alteration can happen in stressful situations,
for example, where blood pressure can rise

and offer risks of lesions in the brain, heart,
and kidney.

It is always a good idea to have a few natural
techniques under your sleeve to control your
blood pressure and avoid more serious problems.

One of these techniques can be done at home
and with a common food: onion.

Onion helps lower blood pressure thanks to
its antioxidants and alliin, which promote

the relaxation of blood vessels, improving
blood circulation.

It can also act against platelet aggregation,
lowering the risk of clot formations that

can favor the development of a stroke, isn't
it cool?
See how quick and easy this technique is!

Making the onion juice is very easy.

Slice the onion very thinly and put the slices
in a glass of water.
Let it sit for 12 hours.

It's recommended to make this juice in the
afternoon

to have it ready in the morning since it needs
to be drunk as soon as you wake up.

In the following morning, drink your onion
juice.

Another trick is to put an onion slice on
the soles of your feet.

Slice a red onion, making sure they are even
and not too thick, so it won't be uncomfortable.

Put a slice on each foot and wear socks to
hold them in place while you sleep.
Use them for 5 days in a row.
It's a trick from the old days.
Try it and share your experience with us.

Also, check how to do a simple exercise with
only a towel to lower your blood pressure
at home.

More than any tricks, keep a healthy diet,
drink water, and practice physical activities,
such as walking.

When possible, have your blood pressure measured
and seek a doctor to investigate the causes
of the change.
